# SpatialHetero

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SpatialHetero is to evaluate spatial heterogeneity across aquatic ecosystems.

Inspired by [Ortiz and Wilkinson (2021)](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/fwb.13814) and prior works.
